fields.translation: Hi. When I grow up, I want to become a painter. This seems a little difficult as of now because my school does not have a drawing teacher. This is something that makes me unhappy. I wish I could go to a school with an arts department.
fields.name: Sarah

fields.translation: Hi. When I grow up, I want to become a painter. This seems a little difficult as of now because my school does not have a drawing teacher. This is something that makes me unhappy. I wish I could go to a school with an arts department.
fields.name: Nabeel
